The Pet Sitting Service You Can Entrust Your Pets With

It can sometimes be hard to leave your pets behind, especially if they are not used to being alone, and have a hard time dealing with separation. This is why most pet owners would choose to hire a pet sitting service like Pet Pleasers to take care of their fur babies while they are away. Instead of having to ask favors from your neighbors and not getting the assurance that they would be able to do it, you can hire someone who will no doubt be able to do it.

My Services

Pet Sitting

If you are in need of someone to take care of your pets while you are away, and cannot or can no longer call a friend or ask for favors, know that you can always count on my services. Whether you need me to watch a full-grown dog, or if you need puppy sitting services, I can do it. 

Drop-by Pet Feeding

If you have pets and animals that do not need much care and are either trained or know what to do without you for long periods of time, you can avail of my pet feeding service that would assure I occasionally drop by your home and feed your pets on suggested feeding schedules.

Farm Care Service

Need someone to take care of the animals on a farm while you are away? Know that you can also trust me with such a service. 

Home-Like Pet Treatment

If you want your pets to get used to or to feel and think that they are at home when you leave them with me, my home-like pet treatment will do just the trick. 

Leave Your Pets in Safe and Reliable Hands

You would want only the best for your pets, especially if you had just gotten them and do not want them to grow up having separation anxiety. While you may be able to ask favors from neighbors and friends, nothing beats the assurance coming from a professional pet sitter. Not only will you be assured of the fact that your pets are with someone who knows how to handle them, but you also do not put anyone at risk of injuries or fights because of the lack of knowledge in handling pets the right way. It is always safer to leave a job—that is often very hard to do and requires commitment, knowledge, and dedication—to someone who has done it a lot of times before.

Choose Me

I have been doing cat and dog sitting for decades now and have come across different breeds with different temperaments. You can trust that I have seen and taken care of a lot of different kinds of pets. I studied how to deal with animals and am always careful when dealing with someone else’s pets knowing how important and loved these creatures are and should be. You can trust that I would be just as gentle and patient with your pets as if they were my own.

My Service Areas

If you would want any clarification on the location of my services, and if you would be able to hire me for a pet sitting, know that my main service area is in and around Lynden, WA. Although I have expanded to newer areas which are listed down below.

  • Everson, WA
  • Ferndale, WA
  • Birch Bay, WA
  • Sudden Valley, WA
  • Blaine, WA

Give yourself the assurance you need, and your pets the love and care they deserve, with my dog and cat sitting services in Lynden, WA. To book a service today or know more about it you can just give Pet Pleasers a call at your convenience.
